title: How to Fix Roblox Infinite Install Loop: Quick & Easy Steps

steps.title: Delete ROBLOX off your PC or laptop fully.
steps.content: Delete ROBLOX off your PC or laptop fully.

steps.title: Open up Firefox.
steps.content: Open up Firefox. Directly under the X should be 3 lines. Click that menu.

steps.title: Click Options.
steps.content: Click Options . You should be in general.

steps.title: On the left, go to Applications.
steps.content: On the left, go to Applications .

steps.title: Don't close this menu.
steps.content: Don't close this menu. Open a new tab and go to ROBLOX.

steps.title: Find a game and click Play.
steps.content: Find a game and click Play . Then install ROBLOX.

steps.title: Go back to Applications and refresh the page.
steps.content: Go back to Applications and refresh the page. Search for your ROBLOX player. If it's not there, restart Firefox.

steps.title: Minimize Firefox and find exactly where your Roblox player is.
steps.content: Minimize Firefox and find exactly where your Roblox player is.

steps.title: Once you have found it, navigate to it via the menu on the left.
steps.content: Once you have found it, navigate to it via the menu on the left.

steps.title: Go onto ROBLOX and click Play.
steps.content: Go onto ROBLOX and click Play . It should look like this in applications.
